body_html:
@asimshankar :

I think I correctly followed instruction on
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x

After the $ brew cask install cuda
I added Env to my bash_profile like this

I don't know what the problem is. Trying to re-install tensorflow is my only solution I can use?
Thank you for your help.

body: @asimshankar : I think I correctly followed instruction on https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x After the `$ brew cask install cuda` I added Env to my bash_profile like this I don't know what the problem is.
